snippet: One of Joseph J. Lhota’s credentials in appealing to Republican voters is his association with former Mayor Rudolph W. Giuliani. Now, Mr. Lhota’s top rival in the Republican mayoral primary, John A. Catsimatidis, is taking aim at that pairing.
abstract: One of Joseph J. Lhota’s credentials in appealing to Republican voters is his association with former Mayor Rudolph W. Giuliani. Now, Mr. Lhota’s top rival in the Republican mayoral primary, John A. Catsimatidis, is taking aim at that pairing.

headline.main: The Ad Campaign: 'Lhota, You're No Rudy'
headline.print_headline: The Ad Campaign: ‘Lhota, You’re No Rudy’
